entry.title: Floyd's family asks police chief question on live TV

media:group.media:title: Floyd's family asks police chief question on live TV
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Sara Sidner speaks with Minneapolis Police Chief Medaria Arradondo at the scene where George Floyd was killed while in police custody.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Sheriff takes off riot gear and joins peaceful protesters

media:group.media:title: Sheriff takes off riot gear and joins peaceful protesters
media:group.media:description:
Genesee County Sheriff Chris Swanson spoke with demonstrators who were met by police officers in riot gear and then joined the protest, according to CNN affiliate WEYI.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Astronauts disembark SpaceX ship and board space station

media:group.media:title: Astronauts disembark SpaceX ship and board space station
media:group.media:description:
US astronauts Robert Behnken and Douglas Hurley have successfully disembarked the SpaceX Crew Dragon capsule and entered the International Space Station.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Trump briefly taken to underground bunker amid protests

media:group.media:title: Trump briefly taken to underground bunker amid protests
media:group.media:description:
President Trump was briefly taken to a White House underground bunker as protesters gathered in Washington, according to a White House official and a law enforcement source.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Tapper: Some of Trump's allies think he's not up to the task

media:group.media:title: Tapper: Some of Trump's allies think he's not up to the task
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Jake Tapper examines the state of America after nationwide protests over the death of George Floyd and questions whether President Trump is up to the task.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Officer fires pepper balls at reporter

media:group.media:title: Officer fires pepper balls at reporter
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Brian Stelter discusses the attacks on and the arrests of journalists covering the nationwide protests around the death of George Floyd.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Fareed Zakaria: There are deep inequities in this country

media:group.media:title: Fareed Zakaria: There are deep inequities in this country
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Fareed Zakaria shares his observations on the nationwide protests over the death of George Floyd.
#CNN #News

entry.title: National security adviser denies systemic racism in US police forces amid nationwide protests

media:group.media:title: National security adviser denies systemic racism in US police forces amid nationwide protests
media:group.media:description: In an interview with CNN's Jake Tapper, national security adviser Robert O'Brien denied that systemic racism exists across the nation's police forces and discussed the nationwide protests following the death of unarmed black man George Floyd. #CNN #News

entry.title: Sen. Cory Booker: Trump doesn't deserve a response, our people do

media:group.media:title: Sen. Cory Booker: Trump doesn't deserve a response, our people do
media:group.media:description:
Sen. Cory Booker (D-NJ) talks to CNN's Jake Tapper about the protests that have spread across the US following the death of George Floyd.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Atlanta mayor on Trump: He should just stop talking

media:group.media:title: Atlanta mayor on Trump: He should just stop talking
media:group.media:description:
Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms reacts to the way President Donald Trump has been responding to nationwide protests over the death of George Floyd.
#CNN #News

entry.title: John King: This coronavirus statistic is frustrating

media:group.media:title: John King: This coronavirus statistic is frustrating
media:group.media:description: CNN’s John King highlights how African Americans have been disproportionally affected by coronavirus as the death toll continues to mount in the US.#CNN #News

entry.title: Don Lemon calls out Hollywood elite: Where are you during protests?

media:group.media:title: Don Lemon calls out Hollywood elite: Where are you during protests?
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Don Lemon calls celebrities of all races to step up a show public support for protesters demonstrating against the death of George Floyd.
#Lemon #CNN #News

entry.title: Video appears to show NYPD truck plowing through crowd

media:group.media:title: Video appears to show NYPD truck plowing through crowd
media:group.media:description:
New York police are investigating after a video appears to show a New York City Police Department truck plowing through a crowd during a George Floyd protest in Brooklyn. The 27-second video, which was posted to Twitter, shows an NYPD truck in front of a crowd throwing objects at the vehicle. There is a barricade in front of the truck. The truck then appears to drive into the barricade, knocking over protestors. Screaming and yelling are then heard while a person is seen jumping on top of the truck. It's unclear if there were any injuries. CNN has reached out to the NYPD, New York governor and Attorney General's office for comment. Earlier, Gov. Andrew Cuomo said he ordered the state attorney general to independently review the events of Friday's protests that included protesters clashing with police in Brooklyn and other boroughs.
#Floyd #CNN #News

entry.title: Protester calls out looters: There's something wrong with you

media:group.media:title: Protester calls out looters: There's something wrong with you
media:group.media:description:
Protesters in Minneapolis responded to individuals looting during the nationwide protests, in response to the killing of George Floyd, saying "something is wrong" with them and "it's not being done in George Floyd's name."
#Floyd #CNN #News
